title: Battlestar Galactica Web Podcasts and BluRay Commentaries mp3
description:
Battlestar Galactica Web Podcasts and BluRay Commentaries
90 mp3 files
81hours 13minutes 10seconds total running time

This is a comprehensive archive of *all* podcasts and commentaries on the new Battlestar Galactica 2003-2009 that were released on the web and on Blu-Ray. They feature Ron Moore, Terry (Ron's wife), directors, writers, producers, editors, actors and fans. Note, Terry Dresbach is married to Ron Moore and is also known as Mrs Ron.

The podcasts were removed from SyFy's website and iTunes so this archive is the only remaining source AFAIK. The Blu-Ray Disc commentaries in this archive are different from the web podcasts that were released as each episode came out. The other commentaries from the Blu-Rays are identical to the web Podcasts.

An excellent resource about the Podcasts is the Battlestar Wiki which includes searchable text transcripts for most of the Podcasts.
 <a href=" http://en.battlestarwiki.org/wiki/List_of_Podcasts" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://en.battlestarwiki.org/wiki/List_of_Podcasts</a> 

The Podcasts and Commentaries are ordered chronologically except for Razor, The Plan and The Face of the Enemy (FOTE was actually the very last BSG item filmed). For an excellent viewing order, please see ThunderPeel2001's Battlestar Galactica Viewing Order (No spoilers!). This describes when it's best to view the webisodes and the movies along with the episodes.
 

In both the Podcasts and Commentaries Ron Moore refers to the "production number" not the "episode number" when he says the episode number. For season3, s03e03 Exodus Part1 and s03e04 Exodus Part2 are production numbers 303a and 303b so s03e05 Collaborators is production number 304. From s03e05 Collaborators onwards, Moore will say the production number which is 1 lower than the actual episode number. For season4, the movie Razor is production number 401 and 402 and episode s04e01 He That Believeth In Me is production number 403. So all of Moore's references are 2 higher than the actual episode number for all of season4.

309.Unfinished.Business.Broadcast has both a 45m28s Podcast and a nearly identical 43m47s Commentary. The Podcast has Grace yelling "Battlestar Galactica!" at the start and then joking with Terry at the end about not being married and double dating with Tahmoh. There is about 1 more minute removed from the Podcast but the removed bits are unknown. This slightly shorter Commentary version of the Podcast is included here for completeness; listen to the longer 309.Unfinished.Business.Broadcast.Podcast to hear everything.
